title: Re: Favorite Quiz Show
content:
Or teh Quiz Meister. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-crazy.gif[/img]

I don't have time or interest to watch any.3D Realms: "Do you think there'll ever be a sequel to your game(s)?"
Tom Hall: "If I owned Keen, there sure would be. I don't consider that GBA game canon by any means."

title: Re: Favorite Quiz Show
content:
I like that show where you have to pick up the phone and call, answer some questions on TV, and win.Retodon8
